physical_appearance:This blue and white dish features a phesant surrounded by two large peonies in the centre. The centre is bordered by a circle. Outside this inner circle
 there are six identical lobed panels with floral sprays that are spaced evenly around the outer circumference of the dish. In between the spaces of these panels on the outer circle
 repeating decorative patterns that are square in shape
 referred to as diapers
 are present.   This is a blue-white dish. Its central medallion features floral sprays
 two peonies
 and a pheasant. Along the inner body of the dish are six cartouches that frame a plant with three flower heads. Diaper patterns decorate the space between each of these panels. Light blue curvilinear strokes can be found on the outer surface of its body.

metadata.physical_appearance: This blue and white dish features a phesant surrounded by two large peonies in the centre. The centre is bordered by a circle. Outside this inner circle, there are six identical lobed panels with floral sprays that are spaced evenly around the outer circumference of the dish. In between the spaces of these panels on the outer circle, repeating decorative patterns that are square in shape, referred to as diapers, are present.   This is a blue-white dish. Its central medallion features floral sprays, two peonies, and a pheasant. Along the inner body of the dish are six cartouches that frame a plant with three flower heads. Diaper patterns decorate the space between each of these panels. Light blue curvilinear strokes can be found on the outer surface of its body.
